default.title: Tree Map Visualization
default.note: This chart shows proportional relationships using nested rectangles.

currency.title: Value Distribution Tree Map
currency.note: This tree map shows the distribution of values across categories.

percentage.title: Percentage Distribution Tree Map
percentage.note: This tree map shows the distribution of percentages across categories.

impVal.title: Figure 3. Import Value from Top Trading Partners
impVal.note: This chart shows the historical import values of the top {{numTop}} trading partners with the US.

impShare.title: Import Share from Top Trading Partners
impShare.note: This chart shows the historical import shares of the top {{numTop}} trading partners with the US.

expVal.title: Figure 3. Export Value to Top Trading Partners
expVal.note: This chart shows the historical export values to the top {{numTop}} trading partners of the US.

expShare.title: Export Share to Top Trading Partners
expShare.note: This chart shows the historical export shares to the top {{numTop}} trading partners of the US.

trade_deficit.title: Trade Balance with Top Trading Partners
trade_deficit.note: This chart shows the historical trade balance with the top {{numTop}} trading partners of the US.

defaults.source: US Census Bureau's USA Trade Online

value.title: Bilateral Trade Values
value.note: This chart shows the historical bilateral trade values between the US and {{selectedCountryName}}.

share.title: Bilateral Trade Shares
share.note: This chart shows the historical bilateral trade shares between the US and {{selectedCountryName}}.

defaults.source: US Census Bureau's USA Trade Online

unweighted.title: Bilateral Tariff Rates (Unweighted)
unweighted.note: This chart shows the bilateral tariff rates between the US and {{country}} using the unweighted average calculation method.

weighted.title: Bilateral Tariff Rates (Trade-Weighted)
weighted.note: This chart shows the bilateral tariff rates between the US and {{country}} using the trade-weighted average calculation method.

unweighted_winsorized.title: Bilateral Tariff Rates (Unweighted Winsorized)
unweighted_winsorized.note: This chart shows the bilateral tariff rates between the US and {{country}} using the unweighted winsorized average calculation method.

weighted_winsorized.title: Bilateral Tariff Rates (Trade-Weighted Winsorized)
weighted_winsorized.note: This chart shows the bilateral tariff rates between the US and {{country}} using the trade-weighted winsorized average calculation method.

defaults.title: Industry Tariff Rates Over Time ({{tariffMethod}})
defaults.note: This chart shows the historical bilateral {{tariffMethod}} tariff rates on all industries between the US and {{country}}. These rates are not inclusive of anti-dumping, non-tariff measures, or section 232 and 301 tariffs.

isic.title: US - {{country}} Tariff Rates by ISIC Over Time ({{tariffMethod}})
isic.note: This chart shows the historical bilateral tariff rates on ISIC industries between the US and {{country}}. Data is sourced from Feodora Teti's Global Tariff Database.

gtap.title: US - {{country}} Tariff Rates by GTAP Over Time ({{tariffMethod}})
gtap.note: This chart shows the historical bilateral tariff rates on GTAP sectors between the US and {{country}}. Data is sourced from Feodora Teti's Global Tariff Database.

section.title: Figure 3. US - {{country}} Tariff Rates by HS-Section Over Time
section.note: This chart shows the historical bilateral {{tariffMethod}} tariff rates on all HS sections between the US and {{country}}.

impVal.title: Import Value by Industry
impVal.note: This chart shows the historical import values for the top {{numTop}} US industries.

impShare.title: Import Share by Industry
impShare.note: This chart shows the historical import shares for the top {{numTop}} US industries.

defaults.source: US Census Bureau's USA Trade Online

isic.title: US - {{country}} Tariff Rates by ISIC ({{year}})
isic.note: This chart shows the tariff rate between the US and {{country}} by ISIC code. Data is sourced from Feodora Teti's Global Tariff Database.

gtap.title: US - {{country}} Tariff Rates by GTAP ({{year}})
gtap.note: This chart shows the tariff rate between the US and {{country}} by GTAP code. Data is sourced from Feodora Teti's Global Tariff Database.

section.title: Figure 2. US - {{country}} Tariff Rates by HS-Section ({{year}})
section.note: This chart shows the statutory tariff rate between the US and {{country}} by section code.

defaults.title: Bar Chart Test
defaults.note: Testing the bar chart renderer with the shared code from sparksGraphingCore.
